mapper.select: SELECT C.BC_BCID, C.BC_NUM, C.BC_COMMENT, C.BC_REGDATE, C.BC_ID FROM MEMBER M, BOARD B, BOARDCOMMENT C WHERE C.BC_NUM = #{BD_NUM} AND B.BD_NUM = C.BC_NUM AND C.BC_ID = M.MEM_ID ORDER BY C.BC_BCID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDCOMMENT( BC_BCID, BC_NUM, BC_ID, BC_COMMENT, BC_REGDATE ) VALUES ( BC_BCID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{BD_NUM}, #{MEM_ID}, #{BC_COMMENT}, SYSDATE )
